column4: I just compiled a new kernel, is i possible to copy my existing  drivers to the new one ?
were they baked in or built as kernel modules?
The older kernel is from the default installation. I just compiled a new one and added it the grub menu. I just wanted to make sure that when I boot into the new kernel, all the drivers are there
usr13 My defaul kernel version is 3.2.26 while I am compiling 2.6.36.4
